name: MetaQuarry
description:
Mine ores and sell them to buy upgrades that let you collect ores and sell them even more effectively in a sci-fi sandbox environment!

If you find a bug, don't worry, I know about it and already consider it a feature.

CONTROLS:

-A and S to move horizontally

-Space to jump

-1 to throw grenade

-2 to throw glowstick

-Shift to use jetpack
